title: Squares, early 20th c
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: patchwork of techniques, including needlework on knotted net, needle lace and bobbin lace
description: Scrolling floral motifs are contained within four T shapes which face inward. Squares of bobbin lace in imitation of reticello complete the field. The border with floral motifs set in diamonds has a knotted tassel at each point, four elaborate tassels at corners.

tombstone.epitaph:
Squares, early 20th c.Medium: linen
Technique: patchwork of techniques, including needlework on knotted net, needle lace and bobbin lace. 1974-8-9-a,b.
